column5: I posted a reply at 10:30 CST it read today 3:30 am so where in China is Walleye central? Or is it in the Azores if today is tomorrow!
go to user control panelunder settings and options choose "edit options"at the bottom you can choose the time zone you want to see
It has been known for some time that WC outsources its moderators to China... Times are tough (sarcasm)
